data.title: Pizza 73
data.meta_description: Check out our delicious menu at Pizza 73! We offer a wide variety of pizzas, sides, desserts, and beverages to satisfy all your cravings. Explore all our options and find your favorites on our menu page. Enjoy!
data.text:
Everyday Deal

Get a pizza + your choice or a second pizza, or shrimp meal + dips or wing meal + Dips

Vegetarian Pizza

Mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, green peppers, red onions and cooked diced tomatoes with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Ultimate Pepperoni Pizza

Loads of Pepperoni and mozzarella cheese, with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Two-Topper Pizza

Mozzarella cheese, and any two toppings, with your choice of sauce, and crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Tandoori Chicken Pizza

Savory Tandoori chicken, mozzarella cheese, red onions and green peppers with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Tandoori Paneer Pizza

Tandoori Paneer, Green Peppers, Cooked Dice Tomatoes and Red Onions. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Sicilian Pizza

Sliced spicy sausage, ham, ground beef, mozzarella cheese, and banana peppers with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Pesto Garden Veggie Pizza

Red onions, spinach, mozzarella cheese, feta cheese, red peppers and pesto sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Pesto Chicken Pizza

Grilled Chicken, mozzarella cheese, black olives and red onions with pesto sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Not-So-Basic Cheese Pizza

Loads of mozzarella and cheddar cheese with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Meat Supreme Pizza

Pepperoni, salami, sausage crumble, ground beef, bacon crumble and mozzarella cheese with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Hawaiian Feast Pizza

Loads of ham, pineapple and mozzarella cheese with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Greek Goddess Pizza

Fresh spinach, red onions, mozzarella cheese, and feta cheese with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Great Canadian Pizza

Bacon crumble, sliced hot sausage, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms and red onions with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Grand Slam Pizza

Pepperoni, ham, sausage crumble, mozzarella cheese, green peppers, mushrooms, red onions and black olives with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Chicken Shawarma Pizza

Shawarma chicken, hot banana peppers, red onions and creamy garlic sauce. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Chicken Deluxe Pizza

Grilled Chicken, mozzarella cheese, green peppers, mushrooms and red onions with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Chicken Bacon Mushroom Melt Pizza

Grilled Chicken, bacon crumble, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms, and red onions with our creamy garlic sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Butter Chicken Pizza

Grilled Chicken, mozzarella cheese, red onions, and red peppers with our creamy butter chicken sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Butter Paneer Pizza

Paneer, mozzarella cheese, red onions, and red peppers with our creamy butter chicken sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Buffalo Chicken Pizza

Grilled Chicken, mozzarella cheese, red peppers, red onions and buffalo sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

BBQ Chicken Pizza

Grilled Chicken, mozzarella cheese, and red onions with our BBQ and tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza

Seasoned ground beef, bacon crumble, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, red onions and sliced pickles with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

73 Deluxe Pizza

Pepperoni, ham, mozzarella cheese, mushrooms and green peppers with our traditional tomato sauce, on your choice of crust. Available in Small 9", Medium 12" and Large 14".

Back to top of page

Get a pizza + your choice of pop!
